title: Face of an Angel. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: June 19th, 2015

Description:

Why are we fascinated by murder? Inspired by the killing of British student Meredith Kercher in Italy, THE FACE OF AN ANGEL looks beyond the salacious headlines to explore both the media and the public's obsession with violent stories, whether fictional or real. Thomas Lang (Daniel BrÃƒÂ¼hl) is a film director who is offered the chance to adapt a book by American journalist Simone Ford (Kate Beckinsale), which recounts the controversial trial of American student Jessica Fuller for the murder of her flatmate Elizabeth Pryce. To help with his research, Simone takes Thomas to Siena, where he is disturbed by the media frenzy that has developed around the case.

Director: Michael Winterbottom

Writers: Paul Viragh

Actors: Daniel BrÃƒÂ¼hl, Kate Beckinsale, Cara Delevingne, Valerio Mastandrea

Genre: Drama

Run Time: 1 hour 41 minutes
